FuncDef: The reset bridge-domain statistics command deletes packet statistics in a specified bridge domain (BD).

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a bridge domain.
The value is an integer
ranging from 1 to 16777215.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before you collect packet statistics within a specified period in a bridge domain, run the reset bridge-domain statistics command to delete existing statistics. Then you can collect correct packet statistics in the bridge domain.
Prerequisites
A bridge domain has been created using the bridge-domain command.
